snippet: The fight over the three-story boardinghouse made a folk hero of Vera Coking, who became known for fending off eminent domain, Donald J. Trump and his multimillion-dollar offers.
abstract: Atlantic City homeowner Vera Coking, who became known for fending off eminent domain, Donald J Trump and his multimillion-dollar offers, finally sells property at auction for $530,000; fight over the three-story boardinghouse made a folk hero of Coking, who is now in a retirement home and bought the boardinghouse in 1961 for $20,000.
lead_paragraph: The fight over the three-story boardinghouse made a folk hero of Vera Coking, who became known for fending off eminent domain, Donald J. Trump and his multimillion-dollar offers.

headline.main: Luster Lost, Atlantic City Home Is Auctioned for $530,000
headline.print_headline: Luster Lost, Atlantic City Home Is Auctioned for $530,000
